# textColor

**Instance Property**

The color to use to draw the cell’s text.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var textColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Related Documentation

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the cell’s background.
- **textColor**: The color of the text field’s content.
